about_the_game:
The complete One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party original soundtrack!

8 tracks composed by NomnomNami, available in MP3 (320kbps) format, plus one bonus track by RMZ, totally 9 tracks.

Track list:
1. Village of Wheat
2. Estranged Family
3. Demon of Greed
4. Lee
5. The Dinner Party
6. Cursed Place
7. Mass
8. Beracus
9. Human by RMZ (Credits Song)

MP3 (320kbps) format, 34.6 MB album size, includes 2 pieces of album art.
